sourcesContent:
export const frameworks = {
  ADDIE: {
    id: 'ADDIE',
    name: 'ADDIE Framework',
    image: '/ADDIE_framework_poster.png',
    description: 'Step-by-step process',
    bestFor: 'Systematic approach',
    process: 'Analyze → Design → Develop → Implement → Evaluate',
    focus: 'systematic_thorough',
    tools: ['Gap Analysis', 'Design Specs'],
    alexExplanation: 'ADDIE is systematic and thorough. Perfect for complete overhauls.'
  },
  
  SAM: {
    id: 'SAM',
    name: 'SAM Framework',
    image: '/ADDIE_framework_poster.png',
    description: 'Fast iteration',
    bestFor: 'Rapid prototyping',
    process: 'Prepare → Design → Develop (repeat)',
    focus: 'rapid_iterative',
    tools: ['Quick Mockups', 'Feedback Loops'],
    alexExplanation: 'SAM is rapid and iterative. Ideal for fast results.'
  },
  
  LEC: {
    id: 'LEC',
    name: 'Learning Experience Canvas',
    image: '/LEC_framework_poster.png',
    description: 'Experience focus',
    bestFor: 'User-centered design',
    process: 'Map learner journey → Co-create → Design experience',
    focus: 'human_centered',
    tools: ['Experience Maps', 'Co-creation'],
    alexExplanation: 'LEC is human-centered design. Best for engagement challenges.'
  }
};
